Check out the sale price on this tire
Consistently rated as excellent by 215-65r15 drivers

content.body:
### Shop 215/65R15 Tire Size
What kinds of vehicles are rolling on 215/65R15  tires? This is a tire size you’ll find on older models of the Chrysler Town & Country, Buick Regal, Dodge Grand Caravan, and Chevrolet Lumina. For vehicles like this, you’ll probably want all-season tires that can offer good road manners, long wear, warranty coverage, year-round traction, a quiet, comfortable ride, and predictable handling.

Looking for a new set of 215/65R15 tires for your ride? Take a look at the BFGoodrich Radial T/A, [Yokohama Avid Touring-S](https://simpletire.com/brands/yokohama-tires/avid-touring-s), Kumho Solus TA11, and Toyo Extensa A/S II. These tires are all great options that can deliver the kind of value and performance you need in an all-season tire. 

Whether you drive an older Buick Regal, Chrysler Town & Country, Dodge Grand Caravan, or something else, SimpleTire has a set of 215/65R15 tires that meets your needs at a great price!

info.title: Did you know?
info.body: A reliable brand is the #1 ask for most drivers. Here you can shop all the most popular brands and discover new ones – all tested, ranked and rated by our customers.
